description:
Despite being at a complete disadvantage against Imagawa`s army, Nobunaga and his troops advance towards Imagawa`s main army. Chidori locates Imagawa, and informs Nobunaga and they finally have him in their sights.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In the Center of Okehazama, Yoshimoto Yells
Le cri de Yoshimoto en plein Okehazama
Okehazama no Chuushin de, Yoshimoto ga Sakebu
桶狭間の中心で, 義元がさけぶ
